name: Plantorio
description:
https://i.gyazo.com/a80137927e31caa950567d2356788a12.mp4

Help the bunny spirit construct a garden factory to bring in the new season. The goal is to produce refined sunshine in incubators, creating and automating resources along the way.

Created in 2 weeks for Great Spring Game Jam 2021.

Made in Godot.

Controls

  • [Mouse1] Select/place plants/build pipes/configure plants
  • [WASD/Arrows] Move the camera
  • [1-5] Select plant schematic for building
  • [X] Refund plants (100% cost returned)
  • [R] Reverse pipe direction (they loop anyway!)
